title: Instructional Design for Integrating AI-Assisted Laboratory Instruction and Environmental Sustainability

context.prior_knowledge: Basic physics concepts and computer literacy skills
context.additional_context: A blended learning environment integrating AI-based experimental tools with environmental sustainability concepts.

learning_goals: Learners can collect and analyze physics experiment data using AI-based experimental tools and perform environmental impact assessments.
Learners can propose sustainable experimental designs that consider resource efficiency and carbon emission reduction during the experimental process.
Learners can derive improvement plans for AI-integrated experiment classes based on peer feedback in blended learning environments.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
